select.isEqual:
SELECT 'DOC' TYPE, TBL_APRDOCINFO.DOCID, DOCTYPE, FUNCTIONTYPE, ORGDOCID, DocTitle FILENAME, Href FILEPATH, 1 AS TYPESN, 1 AS VIEWSN, 1 AS ATTACHFILESN, WRITERNAME, WRITERDEPTNAME, STARTDATE FROM TBL_APRDOCINFO
WHERE TBL_APRDOCINFO.TENANT_ID = #v_tenantID# AND TBL_APRDOCINFO.COMPANYID = #v_companyID# AND TBL_APRDOCINFO.HREF IS NOT NULL
WHERE STARTDATE BETWEEN #v_startDate# AND #v_endDate# AND TBL_APRDOCINFO.TENANT_ID = #v_tenantID# AND TBL_APRDOCINFO.COMPANYID = #v_companyID#

SELECT 'DOC' TYPE, TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.DOCID, DocTitle FILENAME, Href FILEPATH, 1 AS TYPESN, 1 AS VIEWSN, 1 AS ATTACHFILESN, WRITERNAME, WRITERDEPTNAME, DOCNO, ENDDATE FROM TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO
WHERE TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.TENANT_ID = #v_tenantID# AND TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.COMPANYID = #v_companyID#
WHERE ENDDATE BETWEEN #v_startDate# AND #v_endDate# AND TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.TENANT_ID = #v_tenantID# AND TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.COMPANYID = #v_companyID#

SELECT 'ATT' TYPE, TBL_APRDOCINFO.DOCID, DISPLAYNAME FILENAME, AttachFileHref FILEPATH, 2 AS TYPESN, NVL(VIEWORDER, ATTACHFILESN) AS VIEWSN, ATTACHFILESN, STARTDATE FROM TBL_APRATTACHINFO INNER JOIN TBL_APRDOCINFO ON TBL_APRATTACHINFO.DOCID = TBL_APRDOCINFO.DOCID AND TBL_APRATTACHINFO.COMPANYID = TBL_APRDOCINFO.COMPANYID AND TBL_APRATTACHINFO.TENANT_ID = TBL_APRDOCINFO.TENANT_ID
WHERE TBL_APRDOCINFO.TENANT_ID = #v_tenantID# AND TBL_APRDOCINFO.COMPANYID = #v_companyID#
WHERE STARTDATE BETWEEN #v_startDate# AND #v_endDate# AND TBL_APRDOCINFO.TENANT_ID = #v_tenantID# AND TBL_APRDOCINFO.COMPANYID = #v_companyID#

SELECT 'ATT' TYPE , TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.DOCID, DISPLAYNAME FILENAME , AttachFileHref FILEPATH , 2 AS TYPESN, NVL(VIEWORDER, ATTACHFILESN) AS VIEWSN, ATTACHFILESN, ENDDATE FROM TBL_ENDATTACHINFO INNER JOIN TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO ON TBL_ENDATTACHINFO.DOCID = TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.DOCID AND TBL_ENDATTACHINFO.COMPANYID = TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.COMPANYID AND TBL_ENDATTACHINFO.TENANT_ID = TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.TENANT_ID
WHERE TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.TENANT_ID = #v_tenantID# AND TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.COMPANYID = #v_companyID#
WHERE ENDDATE BETWEEN #v_startDate# AND #v_endDate# AND TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.TENANT_ID = #v_tenantID# AND TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.COMPANYID = #v_companyID#

SELECT 'ATTDOC' TYPE, TBL_APRDOCINFO.DOCID, AttachDocName FILENAME, AttachDocURL FILEPATH, 3 AS TYPESN, ATTACHSN, 1 AS ATTACHFILESN, STARTDATE FROM TBL_APRDOCATTACHINFO INNER JOIN TBL_APRDOCINFO ON TBL_APRDOCATTACHINFO.DOCID = TBL_APRDOCINFO.DOCID AND TBL_APRDOCATTACHINFO.COMPANYID = TBL_APRDOCINFO.COMPANYID AND TBL_APRDOCATTACHINFO.TENANT_ID = TBL_APRDOCINFO.tenant_ID
WHERE TBL_APRDOCINFO.TENANT_ID = #v_tenantID# AND TBL_APRDOCINFO.COMPANYID = #v_companyID#
WHERE STARTDATE BETWEEN #v_startDate# AND #v_endDate# AND TBL_APRDOCINFO.TENANT_ID = #v_tenantID# AND TBL_APRDOCINFO.COMPANYID = #v_companyID#

SELECT 'ATTDOC' TYPE, TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.DOCID, AttachDocName FILENAME, AttachDocURL FILEPATH, 3 AS TYPESN, ATTACHSN, 1 AS ATTACHFILESN, ENDDATE FROM TBL_ENDAPRDOCATTACHINFO INNER JOIN TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO ON TBL_ENDAPRDOCATTACHINFO.DOCID = TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.DOCID AND TBL_ENDAPRDOCATTACHINFO.COMPANYID = TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.COMPANYID AND TBL_ENDAPRDOCATTACHINFO.TENANT_ID = TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.tenant_ID
WHERE TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.TENANT_ID = #v_tenantID# AND TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.COMPANYID = #v_companyID#
WHERE ENDDATE BETWEEN #v_startDate# AND #v_endDate# AND TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.TENANT_ID = #v_tenantID# AND TBL_ENDAPRDOCINFO.COMPANYID = #v_companyID#
